title: Vayne
body: change her 3 stack passive to bonus ad instead of true damage and either remove the  bonus ad or the invis from her ult please

replies.body: riots balance team are way to incompetent to do their job propperly they go and bufff yasuo when he needs a nerf and a kit chnage more then anything and same with vayne she does way way to much damage and its beyond a joke
